channel.title: CVE Feed for Eaton -- Intelligent Power Manager (IPM 1)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eaton -- Intelligent Power Manager (IPM 1)

item.title: CVE-2021-23287|2024-09-16T20:59:12.709Z -- eaton -- intelligent%20power%20manager%20%28ipm%201%29
item.description: The vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of input of certain resources within the IPM software. This issue affects: Intelligent Power Manager (IPM 1) versions prior to 1.70.
